snippet: In the case against former Senator John Edwards, a judge denied the defense’s argument that the prosecution had failed to offer sufficient evidence of criminal conspiracy and other charges.
abstract: Federal Judge Catherine C Eagles denies a motion by John Edwards's lawyers to dismiss the criminal conspiracy and other charges against him.
lead_paragraph: In the case against former Senator John Edwards, a judge denied the defense’s argument that the prosecution had failed to offer sufficient evidence of criminal conspiracy and other charges.

headline.seo: John Edwards Trial Will Proceed to Jury
headline.main: Motion to Dismiss Charges Against Edwards Is Denied
headline.print_headline: Motion to Dismiss Charges Against Edwards Is Denied
